abstract: Dictionaries of Wi-Fi Aware services that the app can publish or subscribe to.
overview:
## Overview

This key works with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/WiFiAware] framework, to define the services your app publishes, or to specify the services your app subscribes to, or both.

The system requires your app to have the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Entitlements/com.apple.developer.wifi-aware] entitlement, configured according to services you specify in this key to interact with the specified services at runtime.

For information on defining the services, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/WiFiAware/Adopting-Wi-Fi-Aware].

# WiFiAwareServices

**Property List Key**

Dictionaries of Wi-Fi Aware services that the app can publish or subscribe to.

## Overview

This key works with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/WiFiAware] framework, to define the services your app publishes, or to specify the services your app subscribes to, or both.

The system requires your app to have the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Entitlements/com.apple.developer.wifi-aware] entitlement, configured according to services you specify in this key to interact with the specified services at runtime.

For information on defining the services, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/WiFiAware/Adopting-Wi-Fi-Aware].
title: WiFiAwareServices
